sourceContent:
Complete the remaining work for connector health checks.

- Implement final pieces to complete health-check functionality
- Surface connector status in admin UI
- Add reconnect actions for failed connectors
- When a webhook fails, update the status in the connector_installations table

createData.title: Complete connector health checks implementation
